Control Statement: The information system automatically audits account creation, modification, enabling, disabling, and removal actions, and notifies [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles].Supplemental Guidance: Related controls: AU-2, AU-12.

control_attributes.description: The information system automatically audits account creation, modification, enabling, disabling, and removal actions, and notifies [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles].Supplemental Guidance: Related controls: AU-2, AU-12.
control_attributes.SelectionParam: AC-2 (4) [organization and/or service provider system owner]
